welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Valley City, where the beautiful landscapes and friendly locals make for a charming and unforgettable experience. Enjoy our vibrant arts scene, outdoor adventures, and diverse culinary offerings as you explore all this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Copper Creek Pub & Grub

restaurants.address: 3451 S 5600 W, Salt Lake City, UT 84120

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Salt Lake City International Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
